summary: This mod adds a Flame Lord companion from Vicn\'s creature resource mod. The Flame Lord is located near Whiterun at the Ritual Stone.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a Flame Lord companion from Vicn\'s creature resource mod. The Flame Lord is located near Whiterun at the Ritual Stone.

If you like this mod, please endorse!

My other mods: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4831711/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Mods[/url]

Thanks, enjoy!
author: billmineface
